topic.title: Installation / Usage of pre-built versions
topic.shortdesc: How to use the pre-built versions

body.p: There are also pre-compiled or pre-built versions of the agent maintained by the project. The idea is to launch the agent without installing anything on your system. Here are the steps :

ul.li: Download the pre-built version for your OS: http://prebuilt.fusioninventory.org/stable/

li.p: Launch the agent with the following command:
